venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
If you believe it is possible that you have lived before, hypnosis can allow you to explore past life relationships and cultivate strengths and talents from your earlier lives.

Enjoy a group hypnosis regression as you hypnotically Time Travel on a journey of inner discovery.


Bring a pillow, blanket and mat, if desired.

Facilitated by Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist, Time Traveler.

 

Preregistration required. Please contact Kathryn  either through Meetup or through contact info given below.

 

For more information,

visit: http://www.hypnosis.ws -or- http://www.localendar.com/public/km

 

Kathryn has been facilitating Past Life Regressions since her own first regression experience in 1977.

 

.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: Past Life Regression seminar
